Species.Name: Ishi Tib
Species.Description: [H4]Ishi Tib[h4] See page 21 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Amphibious
Option.Description: Ishi Tib can breathe underwater without penalty and never suffer movement penalties for traveling through water.

Option.Name: Water Dependence
Option.Description: If an Ishi Tib has not been doused in salt water in the last twenty-four hours, the character's wound threshold is reduced by 2. This condition remains in effect until the ishi Tib is doused in salt water.
